Introduction to AOP with PostSharp w/Mike Hall

Description: From Chicago Code Camp 2009 at Lake County Community College, May 2009. My topic was an introduction to Aspect-Oriented Programming using the Post# framework. This was my first public presentation, I think it's obvious especially in the beginning. The slides and additional information can be found here: http://just3ws.pbworks.com/Introduction-to-AOP-with-PostSharp
Duration: 70 min · Published: Sep 09, 2009
